CustomOptOut.ShowEditorDescription: 启用此选项可在简单的CSS编辑器中显示“自定义CSS”代码。
CustomOptOut.EditorThemeDescription: 为编辑器选择一个主题。
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssStylesDescription: This css styles will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssFileDescription: This css file will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.EnableJavascriptInjectionDescription: 启用此选项可显示要输入javascript的字段。
